Html:
Hi, first let me say great work on HTML5-ifying this really cool control!  Do you think you could consider releasing this under the MIT license as well?  That seems to be most common for JavaScript UI controls and libraries (jquery, etc...).  The reason I ask as is I see a ton of enterprise uses for this and GPL is going to block out ISVs whose customers require a local install of their product.

You might also consider a dual GPL and commercial license, like the scheme used by Sencha (http://www.sencha.com/products/extjs/license/), KendoUI, and others who make UI widgets.

Thanks and great work!

Hi, we already do dual licence the HTML5 PivotViewer (just haven't really advertised the fact). Our commercial version has more features and is not under the same restrictions as GPL. Get in contact with me at roger.noble@lobsterpot.com.au to find out more.
